titlestmt.titleproper: Luigi Palma di Cesnola selected papers

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 15:53:15 -0400.

did.unittitle: Luigi Palma di Cesnola selected papers

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, mostly with Hiram Hitchcock; papers relating to his book, CYPRUS, published in 1878; legal papers; pamphlets, periodicals, and clippings; photograghs of works of art; and biographical material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Selected papers from the Cesnola collection at Dartmouth College. Including:

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: Luigi Palma di Cesnola papers. Owned by the Dartmouth College Library. Microfilmed by the Archives of American Art, Smithsonian Institution.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reel 1532 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Museum director, writer and archaelogist. Born Italy. Came to the United States in 1860.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection is a selected portion of Dartmouth College's Cesnola collection.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Inventory of the collection of Cesnola papers in Dartmouth College Library appears on microfilm.
